Edward Joseph Clarence Panzer

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Lester Lotz
  3. Foster Family Alt: Lotts
  4. Location of Family: Tekamah, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Tekamah, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 16
  8. Date of Birth: 1907-03-25, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1991, Los Angeles, CA
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: Images from Nebraska State Historical Society; Nebraska State Historical Society, Official Government Website for The Panzer Brothers; The Burt County Herald, 26 October 1922; National Orphan Train Complex.
